content.question: Which of the following does the author most directly use as evidence of a shift in political attitudes toward authority?

choices.label: The attack of scholars against their superiors
The demands of lay people for their leaders to adopt Protestant reforms
The privileged status of scholars in medieval society

content.answer: The demands of lay people for their leaders to adopt Protestant reforms

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
